You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from an Outline installation – collections, documents, and images will be imported. In Outline, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.

Where do I find the file?: Where do I find the file?
In Notion, click <em>Settings & Members<: In Notion, click Settings & Members in the left sidebar and open Settings. Look for the Export section, and click Export all workspace content. Choose HTML as the format for the best data compatability.

These settings affect the way that your: These settings affect the way that your workspace appears to everyone on the team.
The logo is displayed at the top left of: The logo is displayed at the top left of the application.
The workspace name, usually the same as: The workspace name, usually the same as your company name.
Customize the interface look and feel.

Your workspace will be accessible at: Your workspace will be accessible at
Choose a subdomain to enable a login pag: Choose a subdomain to enable a login page just for your team.
This is the screen that workspace member: This is the screen that workspace members will first see when they sign in.
You can delete this entire workspace inc: You can delete this entire workspace including collections, documents, and users.
A full export might take some time, cons: A full export might take some time, consider exporting a single document or collection. The exported data is a zip of your documents in Markdown format. You may leave this page once the export has started – if you have notifications enabled, we will email a link to {{ userEmail }} when it’s complete.
Manage optional and beta features. Chang: Manage optional and beta features. Changing these settings will affect the experience for all members of the workspace.
When enabled documents have a separate e: When enabled documents have a separate editing mode by default instead of being always editable. This setting can be overridden by user preferences.
When enabled team members can add commen: When enabled team members can add comments to documents.
Groups can be used to organize and manag: از گروه‌ها برای دسته‌بندی و مدیریت افراد تیم خود استفاده نمایید.
Quickly transfer your existing documents: Quickly transfer your existing documents, pages, and files from other tools and services into {{appName}}. You can also drag and drop any HTML, Markdown, and text documents directly into Collections in the app.
Import a zip file of Markdown documents: Import a zip file of Markdown documents (exported from version 0.67.0 or earlier)
Import a JSON data file exported from an: Import a JSON data file exported from another {{ appName }} instance
Import pages from a Confluence instance: وارد کردن صفحات از یک نمونه Confluence
Everyone that has signed into {{appName}: Everyone that has signed into {{appName}} is listed here. It’s possible that there are other users who have access through {{signinMethods}} but haven’t signed in yet.

Receive a notification when a document you are subscribed to or a thread you participated in receives a comment

Receive a notification when a comment th: Receive a notification when a comment thread you were involved in is resolved

Tips on getting started with features an: Tips on getting started with features and functionality
Receive an email when new features of no: هر زمان ویژگی قابل توجهی جدیدی معرفی می‌شود، اعلانی دریافت کنید

Manage when and where you receive email: Manage when and where you receive email notifications.

Create personal API keys to authenticate: Create personal API keys to authenticate with the API and programatically control your workspace's data. API keys have the same permissions as your user account. For more details see the developer documentation.
Manage settings that affect your persona: Manage settings that affect your personal experience.
Choose the interface language. Community: Choose the interface language. Community translations are accepted though our <2>translation portal</2>.
Choose your preferred interface color sc: Choose your preferred interface color scheme.
Show a hand cursor when hovering over in: Show a hand cursor when hovering over interactive elements.
Show line numbers on code blocks in docu: Show line numbers on code blocks in documents.
When enabled, documents have a separate: When enabled, documents have a separate editing mode. When disabled, documents are always editable when you have permission.
Automatically return to the document you: Automatically return to the document you were last viewing when the app is re-opened.
Auto-format text by replacing shortcuts: Auto-format text by replacing shortcuts with symbols, dashes, smart quotes, and other typographical elements.
You may delete your account at any time,: همیشه می‌توانید حساب‌تان را حذف کنید، ولی توجه داشته باشید که این عملیات قابل بازگشت نیست

Choose a photo or image to represent you: Choose a photo or image to represent yourself.
This could be your real name, or a nickn: This could be your real name, or a nickname — however you’d like people to refer to you.
Are you sure you want to require invites: Are you sure you want to require invites?
New users will first need to be invited: New users will first need to be invited to create an account. Default role and Allowed domains will no longer apply.

Allow editors to invite other people to: Allow editors to invite other people to the workspace
Require members to be invited to the wor: Require members to be invited to the workspace before they can create an account using SSO.
The default user role for new accounts. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet by any member of the workspace
When enabled, viewers can see download o: When enabled, viewers can see download options for documents
When enabled, users can delete their own: When enabled, users can delete their own account from the workspace
Links to supported services are shown as: پیوندها به سایت‌ها و سرویس‌های پشتیبانی شده به صورت جاسازی‌های غنی در سندها نمایش داده می‌شود
Allow editors to create new collections: Allow editors to create new collections within the workspace
Allow editors to create new workspaces: Allow editors to create new workspaces
Add your self-hosted draw.io installatio: Add your self-hosted draw.io installation url here to enable automatic embedding of diagrams within documents.
Add your self-hosted grist installation: Add your self-hosted grist installation URL here.
اشتراک‌گذاری در حال حاضر غیرفعال است.
You can globally enable and disable publ: از تنظیمات امنیتی می‌توانید امکان اشتراک‌گذاری عمومی سندها را در سطح کل سیستم فعال و غیرفعال کنید.
Documents that have been shared are list: سندهای اشتراک‌گذاری شده در اینجا فهرست شده‌اند. هر فردی با پیوند عمومی تا پیش از حذف پیوند می‌تواند به صورت فقط خواندنی به سند مربوطه دسترسی داشته باشد.
You can create templates to help your te: با ساخت قالب‌ها به تیم خود کمک می‌کنید که مستنداتی سازگار و درست ایجاد کنند.
Zapier is a platform that allows {{appNa: Zapier is a platform that allows {{appName}} to easily integrate with thousands of other business tools. Automate your workflows, sync data, and more.
A confirmation code has been sent to you: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address, please enter the code below to permanently destroy this workspace.
Deleting the <1>{{workspaceName}}</1> wo: Deleting the <1>{{workspaceName}}</1> workspace will destroy all collections, documents, users, and associated data. You will be immediately logged out of {{appName}}.
Please note that workspaces are complete: Please note that workspaces are completely separated. They can have a different domain, settings, users, and billing.
You are creating a new workspace using y: You are creating a new workspace using your current account — {{email}}
To create a workspace under another emai: To create a workspace under another email please sign up from the homepage
Are you sure you want to permanently del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all the documents in Trash? This action is immediate and cannot be undone.
سطل زباله در حال حاضر خالی است.
A confirmation code has been sent to you: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address, please enter the code below to permanently destroy your account.
Are you sure? Deleting your account will: Are you sure? Deleting your account will destroy identifying data associated with your user and cannot be undone. You will be immediately logged out of {{appName}} and all your API tokens will be revoked.
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in GitHub to connect {{appName}} to your workspace. Try again?
Something went wrong while authenticatin: Something went wrong while authenticating your request. Please try logging in again.
The owner of GitHub account has been req: The owner of GitHub account has been requested to install the {{githubAppName}} GitHub app. Once approved, previews will be shown for respective links.
Enable previews of GitHub issues and pul: Enable previews of GitHub issues and pull requests in documents by connecting a GitHub organization or specific repositories to {appName}.
Disconnecting will prevent previewing Gi: Disconnecting will prevent previewing GitHub links from this organization in documents. Are you sure?
The GitHub integration is currently disa: The GitHub integration is currently disabled. Please set the associated environment variables and restart the server to enable the integration.
Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID: Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID to send document views and analytics from the workspace to your own Google Analytics account.
Create a \"Web\" stream in your Google A: Create a "Web" stream in your Google Analytics admin dashboard and copy the measurement ID from the generated code snippet to install.
Configure a Matomo installation to send: Configure a Matomo installation to send views and analytics from the workspace to your own Matomo instance.
The URL of your Matomo instance. If you: The URL of your Matomo instance. If you are using Matomo Cloud it will end in matomo.cloud/
An ID that uniquely identifies the websi: An ID that uniquely identifies the website in your Matomo instance.
These events should be posted to Slack: این رویدادها باید در Slack پست شوند
This will prevent any future updates fro: This will prevent any future updates from being posted to this Slack channel. Are you sure?
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in Slack to connect {{appName}} to your workspace. Try again?
Link your {{appName}} account to Slack t: Link your {{appName}} account to Slack to enable searching and previewing the documents you have access to, directly within chat.
Disconnecting your personal account will: Disconnecting your personal account will prevent searching for documents from Slack. Are you sure?
Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links: Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links shared in Slack and use the {{ command }} slash command to search for documents without leaving your chat.
This will remove the Outline slash comma: This will remove the Outline slash command from your Slack workspace. Are you sure?
Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack: Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack channels. Messages will be automatically posted to Slack when documents are published or updated.

To search your workspace use {{ command }}.

Configure a Umami installation to send v: Configure a Umami installation to send views and analytics from the workspace to your own Umami instance.
The URL of your Umami instance. If you a: The URL of your Umami instance. If you are using Umami Cloud it will begin with {{ url }}
The name of the script file that Umami u: The name of the script file that Umami uses to track analytics.
An ID that uniquely identifies the websi: An ID that uniquely identifies the website in your Umami instance.
Are you sure you want to delete the {{ n: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ name }} webhook?
Provide a descriptive name for this webh: Provide a descriptive name for this webhook and the URL we should send a POST request to when matching events are created.
Subscribe to all events, groups, or indi: Subscribe to all events, groups, or individual events. We recommend only subscribing to the minimum amount of events that your application needs to function.
Webhooks can be used to notify your appl: از Webhooks می توان برای اطلاع دادن به برنامه شما در صورت وقوع رویدادها در {{appName}}استفاده کرد. رویدادها به عنوان یک درخواست https با یک بار JSON در زمان واقعی ارسال می شوند.
